definition: A dilapidated structure or remains of a building, typically associated with historical or architectural significance, often found in picturesque landscapes or urban settings. It is commonly used to describe a decaying structure that has lost its original purpose or function, serving as a reminder of the past or as a tourist attraction.

examples.german: Die Ruine des alten Schlosses ist ein beliebtes Touristenziel.
examples.english: The ruins of the old castle are a popular tourist attraction.
